title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8147.36 - Town of Southampton
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8147.36 - Town of Southampton

State Regulations
(a) Route
27. Route 27 (Sunrise Highway Extension) between Brookhaven-Southampton town
line and terminus of Sunrise Highway Extension at Route 27/CR 39 in the Town of

Southampton. (b) Route 27/CR 29. Route 27/CR 39 between Route 27 at terminus of Sunrise Highway Extension and

Route 27 (Montauk Highway). (c) Route 2. Route 27 (Montauk Highway) between Route 27/CR 39 and Caldor Store, Bridgehampton. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8147.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
